Parameter.name: AUTO_ADJ_CLK_FREQ
Parameter.desc: Clock and Frequency Offset Auto-Adjustment. MSB : control, LSB : RSSI min. level (see struct adm_config_s).

Parameter.name: ADM_ANN_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: ADM ANN Reception Filter disable (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: ADM_PARAM_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: ADM R/W parameters Reception Filter disable (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: ADM_KEY_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: ADM Key Change Reception Filter disable (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_DAY_PRG_WIN_MIN
Parameter.desc: Minimum delay between the AnnDownload and the day of the first block (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_DAY_PRG_WIN_MAX
Parameter.desc: Maximum delay between the AnnDownload and the day of the first block (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: MNT_WINDOW_DURATION
Parameter.desc: Maintenance Window duration in second from 00:00:00 UTC (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_DELTA_SEC_MIN
Parameter.desc: Minimum deltaSec accepted in second (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_BLK_DURATION_MOD
Parameter.desc: Duration of one block in ms (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_BLK_NB_MAX
Parameter.desc: Maximum number of block accepted (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: ADM_RECEPTION_OFFSET
Parameter.desc: Offset to start RX before (in ms) (MSB first, Signed number limited to +/-63ms).

Parameter.name: DWN_RECEPTION_OFFSET
Parameter.desc: Offset to start RX before (in ms) (MSB first, Signed number limited to +/-1000ms).

Parameter.name: L2_EXCH_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: L2 Reception Filter disable (see struct proto_config_s)

Parameter.name: L6_EXCH_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: L6 Reception Filter disable (see struct proto_config_s)
